projectGridLines.title: Title: Process Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Process Engineer 


Description: 


About Us: We are a well-funded startup on a mission to reshape healthy snacking with innovation and passion. Recently securing a strategic investment from ETG's Nutrisco Division, we are growing rapidly and eyeing young people with entrepreneurship mindset


Location: Kheda (Near Ahmedabad), Gujarat


  • Setup processes in our Greenfield; state of the art manufacturing facility
  • Develop and implement process optimization strategies using Lean, Six Sigma, or other continuous improvement methodologies
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including engineering, construction, procurement, and operations to ensure the project stays on schedule and within budget
  • Develop and implement Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and safety protocols for new processes
  • Monitor ongoing processes to ensure they remain efficient, consistent, and aligned with production goals
  • Prepare and maintain comprehensive process documentation, including process flowcharts, system layouts, equipment specifications, and manuals.


Skill sets: Process optimization

Traits expectation: Problem solving, Communication, teamwork

Expected learning: End to end understanding of manufacturing unit

Specific courses required for project execution: Chemical / Manufacturing / Mechanical
